params.buyIn: USDC amount required to join (in smallest units, e.g., 6 decimals)
params.leagueId: Unique identifier for the league (from backend)

returns._0: joined Whether the player has joined

joinLeague(bytes32).details: Caller must have approved this contract for buyIn amount

params.payouts: Array of payout amounts (must sum to pool)

activateLeague(bytes32).notice: Activate a league (close joining, start gameplay)

cancelLeague(bytes32).notice: Cancel a league and refund all participants

getParticipants(bytes32).notice: Get all participants in a league

isParticipant(bytes32,address).notice: Check if an address has joined a league

joinLeague(bytes32).notice: Join a league by transferring buy-in USDC

settleLeague(bytes32,address[],uint256[].notice: Settle a league and distribute payouts to winners
